org.factcenter.qilin.protocols.generic

Class NaorPinkasOT<G>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.factcenter.qilin.protocols.generic.NaorPinkasOT<G>
  • Type Parameters:
    G - the group element type.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ECNaorPinkasOT, ZpNaorPinkasOT

    public class NaorPinkasOT<G>
extends java.lang.Object
    An implementation of the Naor-Pinkas OT protocol over a generic group in which discrete-log is hard. More information about the Naor-Pinkas protocol can be found in the paper.
